description:
Barthomeloi Lorelei is the Vice Director of the http://anidb.net/ch1951 [Mage`s Association] known as "Queen" of London`s Clock Tower, the central institute of the Association, and the current head of the Barthomeloi family. She shares her family`s great sense of aristocracy and pride in their heritage, viewing the name "Lorelei" to be just an insignificant name stuck on to to the her true "Barthomeloi" name.
Source: typemoon.wikia.com
name: Barthomeloi Lorelei
